C.title: UPPERCASE
C.text:
["x]C
Delete from the cursor position to the end of the line and [count]-1 more lines [into register x], and start insert.
Synonym for c$ (not |linewise|).

d.title: lowercase
d.text:
["x]d{motion}
Delete text that {motion} moves over [into register x].

D.title: UPPERCASE
D.text:
["x]D
Delete the characters under the cursor until the end of the line and [count]-1 more lines [into register x];
Synonym for "d$".

e.title: lowercase
e.text: Forward to the end of word [count] |inclusive|.  Does not stop in an empty line.

E.title: UPPERCASE
E.text: Forward to the end of WORD [count] |inclusive|.  Does not stop in an empty line.

f.title: lowercase
f.text:
f{char}
To [count]'th occurrence of {char} to the right.
The cursor is placed on {char} |inclusive|.
{char} can be entered as a digraph. When 'encoding' is set to Unicode, composing characters may be used.

F.title: UPPERCASE
F.text:
F{char}
To the [count]'th occurrence of {char} to the left.
The cursor is placed on {char} |exclusive|.
{char} can be entered like with the |f| command.

g.title: lowercase
g.text: A lot of Vim power found here! check out :help g

G.title: UPPERCASE
G.text:
Goto line [count], default last line, on the first non-blank character |linewise|.
If 'startofline' not set, keep the same column.
G is a one of |jump-motions|.

H.title: UPPERCASE
H.text: Move to top of current visable window.

i.title: lowercase
i.text: Enter into insert mode from normal mode.

I.title: UPPERCASE
I.text: Enter into insert mode at the beginning of the line.

j.title: lowercase
j.text: Move down while in normal mode

J.title: UPPERCASE
J.text: Join next line to this line. Moves cursor to joined location

K.title: UPPERCASE
K.text: Pulls up :man or :help on current word.

L.title: UPPERCASE
L.text: Move to to near bottom of current visable window.

m.title: lowercase
m.text: Set a Mark {a-zA-Z}. Use ' or ` to jump back to set mark {a-zA-Z}.

M.title: UPPERCASE
M.text: Move to the middle of the current visable window.

N.title: UPPERCASE
N.text: Move to next search item in reverse.

o.title: lowercase
o.text: Start a new line below cursor position.

O.title: UPPERCASE
O.text: Start a new line above cursor position.

q.title: lowercase
q.text: Start recording a macro. Use {a-z} for a fresh start or {A-Z} for appending.j

Q.title: UPPERCASE
Q.text: Enter into Ex mode where you can run commands like 21+21 and hit enter to get 42.

r.title: lowercase
r.text: Replace character under cursor with new character

R.title: UPPERCASE
R.text: Replace each character as you type. Backspace will revert until you exit replace mode

s.title: lowercase
s.text: Delete character(s) under cursor and enters insert mode.

S.title: UPPERCASE
S.text: Delete line(s) under cursor and enters insert mode.

t.title: lowercase
t.text: Move cursor to [count]'th occurance of character to the right.

T.title: UPPERCASE
T.text: Move cursor to [count]'th occurance of character to the left.

U.title: UPPERCASE
U.text: Undo all changes on the line where the last change was made.

x.title: lowercase
x.text: Delete character(s) under cursor and after.

X.title: UPPERCASE
X.text: Delete character(s) under cursor and before.

z.title: lowercase
z.text: Redraw window on cursor. z+ for top of window z- for bottom of window and z. for center.
